channel.title: I belive that morpar should close down the registration for this fourm
channel.description: I belive that morpar should close down the registration for this fourm so its better for us to have controll of this site rather than 1 person makes 5 accounts and never use many also its a good idea of keeping away leechers (thats what i think)

item.title: I belive that morpar should close down the registration for this fourm
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The point of this forum is to teach people to program, and to have fun cheating at games and things, one of the premises it was founded on is that we are noob friendly and help everyone. How would you feel if I deleted your account and locked registration, or if I locked the registration before you registered? You would be disappointed and basically would have nowhere to turn to, besides to sythe.org, and does that really compare?

Read full topic
